resources.string:
This app is meant to be used to protect your privacy. Modified and Extended from ObbedCode much lovee.

This is not the POWER OF YOUR CREATION!!

Copyright 2017-%1$d Marcel Bokhorst. All rights reserved.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

Android Support Library
Copyright 2011 The Android Open Source Project. See the license.

Tap on an app icon or name and tick restrictions to apply them. If possible, apps are automatically stopped to apply (or remove) restrictions immediately, but applying restrictions to some apps requires a device restart (see icons below).

Long press on an app name or icon to start the app.

See the documentation and the frequently asked questions for more information.

Hello this is ObbedCode, thanks for all the Love i will keep this project going til I DIE!.

Privacy will never be lost I wont stop til each app is FULLY black boxed.

This is my Art, Quality over Quantity so be patience pls and thanks to all who are patient!.

Whats new in 1.4.2.3 Update XPL-EX (ObbedCode)

!!!Warning this is BETA it WILL have Bugs but over time code will be cleaned and things will be fixed!!!

Privacy will never be lost I wont stop til each app is FULLY black boxed.
This is my Art, Quality over Quantity so be patience pls and thanks to all who are patient!.
Free, Open Source, No Analytics, No Servers, offline ...

Shout out to Hubert (always keeps me informed updated!) (want to hide root ? this is your man!)
Telegram: HubertHub

Shout out to AppListo (Gives me Apis to Hooks when I am lost!)
Website: AppCloner

VDInfos. Grabbing your own Device info cool dev
XDA
GitHub

1.4.2.3 Changes

[Coming Soon possibly next update...]
-> Configs for Hooks ability to select Hooks for a Config and Apply
-> Secure Key Exchange System prevent Fake Communication (IPC)
-> Finish String Translation (moved strings to resources to prepare)
-> Add Option to Select Configs from the MAIN UI and or Option select apps to apply config too

[Main UI]
-> Added Navigation buttons under each App to the new UIs
-> Fixed the Scroll Up Bug (Was most likely caused by poor Theme Handling)
-> Added a Button to Remove Copies of PrivacyEx Hooks from the Hook DB

[Hook UI]
-> Added a NEW UI To Help Manage Hooks and Settings for Hooks!!

[Config UI]
-> Fixed many Bugs
-> Updated Log Messages to UI
-> Added Settings Description and Original Setting Name
-> Added Option to Delete Configs
-> Added Option to Delete Selected Config Settings from Config
-> Enhanced Code

[Settings UI]
-> Enhanced Code
-> Added Options to Switch between using Default Values (when no setting value is present) or strictly use yours or NULL

[Property UI]
-> Added Better searching (search properties)
-> Added Options to Add Property directly from Group
-> Fixed Bugs and Enchained stability
-> Added a new Prop setting Type (force)
-> Added EVEN MORE Properties to Intercept (10+) 291 Total

[Randomizer]
-> Added User-Agent Randomizer (5000 user agents)
-> Added Randomizers for ALL Unique Settings
-> Enhanced Randomizer Core + Added more Randomizers (30+)

[Bugs]
-> Fixed GSF ID Bug and Advertising ID Bug
-> Fixed LAC and CID Hook
-> Fixed Method Resolver Bug + Return Type Void Bug
-> Fixed Call User ID Bug for some Commands
-> Fixed InetAddress Duplicate Hook
-> Fixed Default Settings JSON file rename (value) to (defaultValue)

[Merges]
-> Updated some Hooks and Links, merged from VDInfos

[XLog]
-> Added a new Advance Log Cat Logger to build off of in the Future

[Hooks]
-> Added Logging Hooks for (IO and Shell) to Monitor / Log App Behaviour
-> Cleaned up the Hook Folders and Groups to be more Simple
-> Added Clipboard , Accounts Hooks to PrivacyEx Collection
-> Added Package Manager Hooks (not all still use HMA)
-> Added WebView WebSettings Hooks
-> Added WebView OkHttp3 Hooks
-> Added WebView GeckoView Hooks
-> Added NetworkInfo (VPN) Hook
-> Added GPU Vendor Renderer Hooks (May Not always work)
-> Added ID Hooks......

[ETC]
-> Added Functionality to Check JSON Contents with Database to ensure you get the latest updates!

1.4.2.2 Changes
[+] Fixed the 411dpi Hardcoded Hook Groups Recycler View Bug
[+] Fixed the Shell Interception Bug
[+] Added (uname) to the list of commands to Intercept shell

1.4.2.1 Changes
[+] Modified over 40k lines of code (Re-Programmed whole core)
[+] Fixed the XPL-EX Folder Detection!
[+] Re-Programmed the Properties system (linked properties to settings)
[+] Added some of the Pro Features within the Main Application
[+] Added More Hashes to the Caller Security Check (allow more patched XPrivacyLua Pro versions)
[+] Added a Hook Group Name Cleaner (make names of hooks look better UI)
[+] Added total (272) Build prop Properties
[+] Added Bluetooth List Hook
[+] Added Wifi List Hook
[+] Added More Privacy Hooks!
[+] DRM + GSF Framework ID Hooks Fixed
[+] Many more Hooks + Code Fixed + Cleaned
[+] Added Shell Interception (getprop, su, meminfo)..
[+] Added Settings UI [advance ;) ]
[+] Added Randomizers (20+)
[+] Added better Properties UI
[+] Added Settings Config UI
[+] Changes Command System to be Similar to that one of a C2
[+] Started to add secure core key exchange system
[!] Plus Many more changes applied !!!

This is my Art, Quality over Quantity so be patience pls and thanks to all who are patient!.
Applying restrictions can result in problems
Applying restrictions requires a device restart
Applying restriction failed (tap icon to see why)
Are you sure you really want to Delete this Config ? (whole config)
Parameters are NULL or not filled, make sure something is checked or input!
Failed to open Access to the Target Directory
Failed to open Access to the Target File
Failed to read and or parse the Target Config File
Failed to parse Config, ensure its proper format and extension / type
Failed to Delete Settings / Config, make sure the Config is Saved First!
Finished Applying Config Values to settings!
Delete Setting, either Value and or Map.
Save the Modified Setting Value to the Database
Reset the Setting Value in the UI back to the original value of the last Save.
Randomize Setting Value. (Will not save unless you select save)
Add Build Property to Setting Group. Link the Property to a setting.
Either Selecting and or De-Selecting all Settings in the targeted group
Delete the Build Property from the Setting Group.
Add a Build Property to a Group or the Group
Save the Modified Config to the Database (not settings!!)
Apply the Modified Config to the Settings
When enabled Default Setting Values provided from the Developer will be used IF the setting for the Hook is not set by You as the user. Else return NULL if not set
Saved the Un-Saved settings to the Database
Application Hook Group view to see all assigned Hooks and Groups with their Settings
Configs Menu, modify application settings via Configs
Advance Settings UI not from the Pro App
Properties UI to control Properties Interceptor
Hide Specific Property from Build Props
Skip/Ignore Specific Property from Build Props
Force to push Build Property even if it does not exist.
Hook does not have a Description sorry...
Setting does not have a Description sorry...
Hook does not have any settings...
Property Builder is either Missing Property Name or Setting Name make sure they are filled in...
Are you sure to toggle \'%1$s\' for all apps?
No browser available to open link
